name: Kingdom Attack
description:
Kingdom Attack

Build towers defeat monsters and get victory! the new Tower Defense game "Kingdom attack" is available now !

Join our community and get tons of fun many levels with different strategies are waiting for you can you beat all bosses, let the challenge begin!

Kingdom Attack is a tower defense game with 4 different towers
and each level have a final boss you need to have a good strategy to defend your kingdom














the game installation is simple you only need free 300 mb hard disk and launch the game installer
